<s0>These differ mostly around the ability to debug the application on a secure (non dev) devices, and how the APK is signed.</s0><br1><br2>The debug version is signed with a key/certificate that is created automatically with a known name/password (to prevent required prompt during the build).
<s0>这两个版本的不同，大多是围绕在调试一个安全的（非开发版的）设备的能力，以及 apk 怎么签名。</s0><br1><br2>调试版本使用自动创建的密钥/证书签名，并且密钥/证书的用户名/密码是已知的（以防止构建过程中需要相关的信息）的。

A Gradle project describes its build in a file called <i0>build.gradle</i0> located in the root folder of the project.
Gradle 项目在项目的根文件夹里的<i0>build.gradle</i0>文件中描述它的构建逻辑。
A Library project is very similar to a regular Android project with a few differences.<br0><br1>Since building libraries is different than building applications, a different plugin is used.
Library项目与普通的 Android 项目非常相似，只有一些不同。<br0><br1>由于构建库项目与构建应用程序有些不同不同，所以使用的是不同的插件。
A Library project's main output is an <i0>.aar</i0> package (which stands for Android archive).
一个 Library 项目主要输出的是一个<i0>.aar</i0>包（它代表Android的归档文件）。
A library project can also generate a test apk to test the library independently from an application.
一个库项目还可以生成测试apk，独立于应用程序测试这个库。
A product flavor defines a customized version of the application build by the project.
一个product flavor 定义了由一个项目构建的应用程序的自定义版本。
A single project can have different flavors which change the generated application.<br0><br1>This new concept is designed to help when the differences are very minimum.
单个项目可以有不同的flavors来改变生成的应用程序。<br0><br1>这个新概念的设计是为了解决不同版本之间差异很小的情况。

Because it’s not possible to build an APK that does not have an associated <i0>Build Type</i0>, the APK is always configured with two (or more) configurations: <b1>compile</b1> and <f2><buildtype>Compile</f2>.<br3><s4>Creating a new </s4><i5>Build Type</i5><s6> automatically creates a new configuration based on its name.</s6><br7><br8>This can be useful if the debug version needs to use a custom library (to report crashes for instance), while the release doesn’t, or if they rely on different versions of the same library.<br9>

因为不可能构建一个没有任何关联的<i0>Build Type</i0>的 APK，apk 总是配置两个（或以上）的配置：<b1>compile</b1>和<f2><buildtype>Compile</f2>。 <br3><s4>创建一个新的</s4><i5>Build Type</i5><s6>会基于它的名字自动创建一个新的配置。</s6><br7><br8>这可能会有用，比如debug版本需要使用一个自定义库（例如报告崩溃的信息），而release版本则不需要，或者是他们依赖于同一个库的不同版本的情况下。 <br9>
